title: Is Custom Skin still allowed to use?
body:
last day I saw a video on youtube about using custom skins and I know that Riot said "Use at your own risk" risk before and they said that they dont support it but allowed player to use but at their own risk and as long as custom skins only offer cosmetic to the champion and not giving any advantage to the player

So I just want to ask again for sure if Custom Skin still allowed to use or not?

replies.body:
Programs or modifications that you didn't write yourself will almost always be a **use at your own risk** situation. This is because it's pretty hard to be sure there isn't a hidden feature or modification that *could* give you a competitive advantage. Check out our [Third Party Apps stance](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications) for our official view on these types of programs.

Let me know if you have any questions.
so we can still use custom skins?
At *your own risk*, if you'd like to. But as I mentioned before, it's pretty tough to ensure it won't have a hidden feature or modification unless you wrote the program or package itself.
